ygData.subject: Re: Twisting
ygData.msgSnippet: ... else ... friends ... You don t need to ask a level 50... Can you get to level 50 without twisting? You can get there without playing any songs. But parties
ygData.messageBody:
> Here's another question for our 50th level bard friend. Is twisting a
> requirement, can you possible get to 50th level without twisting. A) I
> think twisting might be a slight exploit (Not that I get mad if anyone
else
> does it), B) the messages that bards spam in the chat window gets so
> annoying, and hard to read, I miss a lot of important messages from
friends
> and party members.

You don't need to ask a level 50...

Can you get to level 50 without twisting? You can get there without playing
any songs. But parties are going to question what good you are. Why does any
hunting party need a bard? Really... they don't. So you need to really
impress people ya don't know. God I had to get a full suit of bronze so I
could get into parties at level 20 because of all the damn twinks.

And twisting is not an exploit, but rather a "feature" of our class. We are
balanced with twisting in mind.

Will one song be good enough? Sure, and your party will boot you out when
the first tank comes along because you are doing 20 points of damage a
round, constantly frenzying the mobs, and don't add anything to the party as
a whole.
